summary:
HSBC is a large British bank and financial group based in London. It has a long history, starting in 1865 in Hong Kong and Shanghai. HSBC became one of the UK's biggest banks after taking over Midland Bank in 1992.

Today, it operates in 62 countries, serving millions of customers. HSBC is one of the world's largest banks by assets. However, it has faced controversies, including fines for money laundering and tax avoidance.
title: HSBC
